meanings.definition: The practice of eating the extremities of the body.
meanings.sent1: Acrotism can be seen in some animals that consume their own tails.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked to witness the acrotism of the zombie, who was eating its own fingers.
meanings.sent3: The horror movie featured a character with a strange acrotism of chewing on their toes.
meanings.sent4: In the twisted world of the novel, acrotism was a sign of a cursed soul.
meanings.sent5: The folklore tale warned of a witch with an insatiable acrotism for human limbs.
